attributes.additional_details: Ensure that Greggs has the opportunity to keep open stores that have the ability to meet the right COVID measures to remain open. As many Greggs locations can stay open with the implementation of delivery services/ pick up stations
attributes.background: Stop the lockdown of Greggs as it has in place the right measures to ensure the safety of both staff and customers. The unnecessary lockdown of Greggs could result in the harm of communities and the disruption of thousands of people across the UK

rejection.details:
Food retailers have been permitted to remain open, with the appropriate safety measures, throughout the national lockdown in England which began on 5 November. See:
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close/closing-certain-businesses-and-venues-in-england
